mapper.select: SELECT memberId, password, passwordFailCnt, nickname, gradeCodeGroup, gradeCode, DATE_FORMAT(registeredDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS registeredDate, DATE_FORMAT(modifiedDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS modifiedDate, DATE_FORMAT(lastLoginDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS lastLoginDate FROM oms_member WHERE memberId = #{memberId}

SELECT memberId, nickname, gradeCodeGroup, gradeCode, DATE_FORMAT(registeredDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS registeredDate, DATE_FORMAT(modifiedDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS modifiedDate, DATE_FORMAT(lastLoginDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS lastLoginDate FROM oms_member WHERE memberId != #{memberId} AND nickname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') AND gradeCodeGroup = 0 AND gradeCode = #{gradeCode} ORDER BY nickname ASC

SELECT memberId, nickname, gradeCode, DATE_FORMAT(registeredDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS registeredDate, DATE_FORMAT(modifiedDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS modifiedDate, DATE_FORMAT(lastLoginDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS lastLoginDate FROM oms_member WHERE nickname = #{nickname}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO oms_member (`memberId`, `password`, `passwordFailCnt`, `nickname`, `gradeCodeGroup`, `gradeCode`, `registeredDate`, `modifiedDate`, `lastLoginDate`) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{password}, 0, #{nickname}, #{gradeCodeGroup}, #{gradeCode}, SYSDATE(), SYSDATE(), NULL)
mapper.update: UPDATE oms_member SET passwordFailCnt = 0, lastLoginDate = SYSDATE() WHERE memberId = #{memberId}
